item.title: Grand Floridian Hotel Reviews
item.description: ##Grand Floridian Hotel Reviews: Sentiment Analysis and NLP #### The data for this analysis was obtained from the reviews posted on TripAdvisor. I used RSelenium and rvest to extract the data from the first 3000 dynamic web-pages on the TripAdvisor site, which was 2,350 reviews in total. The code used to do this is published on my GitHub. Here, I load the the Rda file I saved from that extraction.
